TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CharEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<char>, class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CharEnumerator Implements ICloneable, IEnumerator(Of Char)
public ref class CharEnumerator sealed : ICloneable, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerator<char>
type CharEnumerator = class interface IEnumerator interface ICloneable interface IEnumerator<char> interface IDisposable

summary.span: Supports iterating over a object and reading its individual characters.

span.span: Supports iterating over a object and reading its individual characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A提供的字元所參考的唯讀存取物件。A provides read-only access to the characters in a referenced object. 例如，`foreach`陳述式的 Microsoft Visual Basic 和 C# 程式設計語言，來逐一查看集合的元素，擷取從物件以逐一查看中的字元物件。For example, the `foreach` statement of the Microsoft Visual Basic and C# programming languages, which iterates through the elements of a collection, retrieves a from a object in order to iterate through the characters in that object. 沒有任何公用建構函式。There is no public constructor for . 請改為呼叫物件的方法，以取得，初始化以參考的字串。Instead, call a object's method to obtain a that is initialized to reference the string. A會維護字串中字元的內部索引參考。A maintains an internal index to the characters in the string the references. 索引的狀態時，它所參考，以字串的字元位置以邏輯方式在第一個字元之前或之後的最後一個字元時，無效和有效值參考字串內的字元。The state of the index is invalid when it references a character position logically before the first character or after the last character in the string, and valid when it references a character within the string. 索引會初始化為以邏輯方式前的第一個字元的位置，並完成反覆項目時的位置設定後的最後一個字元。The index is initialized to a position logically before the first character, and is set to a position after the last character when the iteration is complete. 如果您嘗試存取該字元，而索引無效，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if you attempt to access a character while the index is invalid. 方法遞增索引 1，因此第一個與後續字元依序存取。The method increments the index by one, so the first and subsequent characters are accessed in turn. 方法將索引設定為以邏輯方式前的第一個字元的位置。The method sets the index to a position logically before the first character. 屬性擷取目前由索引所參考的字元。The property retrieves the character currently referenced by index. 方法會建立一份。The method creates a copy of the . > [!NOTE] > 數個獨立的執行個體跨一或多個執行緒可以存取的單一執行個體。Several independent instances of across one or more threads can have access to a single instance of . 這個類別實作以支援介面。This class is implemented to support the interface. 如需有關使用的列舉值，請參閱主題。For more information regarding the use of an enumerator, see the topic. ## Examples 下列範例會使用列舉字串中的個別字元的類別。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它會具現化藉由呼叫物件方法，將移出一個字元到下一個呼叫方法，並藉由擷取的值來顯示目前的字元屬性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 不過請注意，相同的作業可以執行所稍微更直覺的方式使用`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如下列範例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

summary.span: Creates a copy of the current object.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object.

returns.span: An that is a copy of the current object.

span.span: An that is a copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是這個執行個體的副本及其目前狀態。The return value is a copy of this instance of and its current state. 這可用來將您的狀態儲存在逐一查看物件。This is useful for saving your state while iterating through a object. 例如，假設您的應用程式使用的原始執行個體來逐一查看每個字元。For example, suppose your application uses an original instance of to iterate through each character in a . 當遇到某些獨特字元時，您的應用程式會暫停處理，並叫用方法。When some unique character is encountered, your application pauses processing and invokes the method. 實際上，這可以節省中的物件的索引。In effect, this saves the object's index in the . 您的應用程式會使用複製來瀏覽至另一個組件的`String`執行一些輔助的處理。Your application uses the clone to navigate to another part of the `String` to perform some auxiliary processing. 這個巡覽的副作用是位置的複製遺失的處理停止。The side-effect of this navigation is the clone loses track of the position where processing stopped. 不過，輔助的處理序完成時，您的應用程式會捨棄複製並使用原始執行個體上繼續處理原始的處理停止。However, when the auxiliary processing is complete, your application discards the clone and uses the original instance to resume working on the where the original processing stopped. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會實作以支援介面。This method is implemented to support the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Char
public: property char Current { char get(); };

summary.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

span.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

value.span: 目前所參考的 Unicode 字元物件。

span.span: The Unicode character currently referenced by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責維護內部的索引，以列舉的字串，而屬性會傳回目前索引所參考的字元。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the property returns the character that is currently referenced by the index. 索引無效; 時，才應叫用這個屬性否則，會擲回例外狀況。This property should be invoked only when the index is valid; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 索引一定是無效的空字串 ("")。The index is always invalid for an empty string (""). 索引無效也之後或呼叫方法。The index is also invalid after the or method is called. 其中一種方法呼叫之後，叫用方法來調整要列舉字串的第一個字元的索引。After either of these methods is called, invoke the method to adjust the index to the first character in the enumerated string. 索引是有效每當方法會傳回`true`。The index is valid whenever the method returns `true`. 索引和連續呼叫不會移動傳回相同的字元，直到， ，或呼叫。 does not move the index, and consecutive calls to return the same character until , , or is called. ## Examples 下列範例會使用列舉字串中的個別字元的類別。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它會具現化藉由呼叫物件方法，將移出一個字元到下一個呼叫方法，並藉由擷取的值來顯示目前的字元屬性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 不過請注意，相同的作業可以執行所稍微更直覺的方式使用`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如下列範例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

exception.span: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.

span.span: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: Increments the internal index of the current object to the next character of the enumerated string.

span.span: Increments the internal index of the current object to the next character of the enumerated string.

returns.span: if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, .

span.span: if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責維護內部的索引，以列舉的字串，而方法索引遞增一。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the method increments the index by one. 呼叫之後呼叫或遞增列舉字串中的第一個字元目前字元位置。Call after calling or to increment the current character position to the first character in the enumerated string. 檢查傳回的值為`true`來判斷目前的字元位置無效。Check that the return value is `true` to determine that the current character position is valid. 如果索引超出列舉字串的最後一個字元，不會變更索引和`false`會傳回。If the index is already beyond the last character of the enumerated string, the index is not changed and `false` is returned. 請注意，如果是空的列舉的字串 ("")，則狀態永遠無效。Notice that if the enumerated string is empty (""), the state of the is always invalid. 這是因為內部索引一開始是先列舉字串的第一個字元，因此無效。This is because the internal index for the is initially before the first character of the enumerated string and is therefore invalid. 以邏輯方式設定這也是無效的列舉字串的最後一個 （不存在） 字元之後的索引。 logically sets the index after the last (nonexistent) character of the enumerated string which is also invalid. ## Examples 下列範例會使用列舉字串中的個別字元的類別。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它會具現化藉由呼叫物件方法，將移出一個字元到下一個呼叫方法，並藉由擷取的值來顯示目前的字元屬性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 不過請注意，相同的作業可以執行所稍微更直覺的方式使用`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如下列範例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]
